subject: Baseball
lead_paragraph: Russ Springer threw four too-close-for-comfort pitches to Barry Bonds on Tuesday night before pinning a 92-mile-an-hour fastball on his right shoulder. For those dangerous pitches, Springer is expected to be suspended three or four games by Major League Baseball.
